name: The labyrinth of the sun god
name_original: The labyrinth of the sun god
description:
PITCH
Stop the storm that has been raging for months by helping the sun god to get out of the labyrinth ,you can be helped by the thunder that lights your way.
Watch out for the monsters that attack you and collect the keys on your way in order to open the doors that block your way.

CONTROL

Keyboard

Q to go left

D to go right

Espace to jump

Escape to pause menu

E to finish

TEAM 

Xavier Decourt
